ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes which represent the observation or measurement of a patient's body temperature. Codes used in this value set are LOINC codes.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify an observation or measurement of a patient's body temperature using LOINC code system. Using the Quality Data Model, this maps to the category of Physical exam finding.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include only those LOINC codes which represent an observation or measurement of a body temperature.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude any codes which do not represent an observation or measurement of a body temperature in LOINC code system.)
